text: you've got great ideas to solve real
problems and good developers to make
your ideas a reality now you need a way
to scale up your application so everyone
can use it Amazon web services is here
to help Amazon web services enables you
to run your application in the cloud
which means you get the benefits of
lowcost flexible infrastructure with the
ability to use your existing tools and
skills to deliver sophisticated and
scalable applications let's look at how
Amazon web services makes building and
scaling web applications easier
with AWS you get complete control of
your resources so you can start building
your application with the technology
you're most familiar with with many
virtual servers to choose from you can
pick the kind of server that's right for
you whether you need a very small
instance or a large cluster of servers
you can even choose specialized servers
optimized for lots of disk space lots of
memory or even special Graphics chips
with AWS you also get the flexibility to
choose the operating system language and
tools that are right for you you can
store your data on any database you like
you can even let AWS manage the database
for you with aws's relational database
service or use aws's managed no SQL
service to achieve fast single-digit
millisecond latency access to your data
you get to focus on making your web app
great while Amazon web services takes
care of the work needed to run your
operations so you never have to worry
about managing a server closet finding a
Colo operator or building a data center
running facilities and utilities while
racking and stacking servers is all
taken care of even better AWS makes
these resources available right away so
you're never waiting weeks or months for
purchasing delivery and provisioning
meaning that your project timelines can
shorten and you can get to Market faster
this quick access to new resources means
you can experiment with new
architectures and Technologies without
having to impact your production
environment or buy new testing Hardware
AWS also gives you access to a vast
amount of resources so you don't have to
have a big budget to have a highly
available architecture that can keep
your site running well even if disaster
strikes AWS provides autoscaling so your
application can elastically grow and
Shrink with demand this means you can
handle a huge increase in traffic when
your app goes viral but also can
automatically turn off resources when
they aren't needed like when your users
are sleeping AWS is lowcost pay only for
what you use pricing model means this
elasticity can save you a bundle there
are no upfront costs and no long-term
contracts to keep you from getting
started or lock you in using Amazon web
services is like having an IT
infrastructure group that always says
yes we can do that it'll be ready for
you in just a minute Amazon web services
can even do all the infrastructure
provisioning for you you can just point
to your git repository or upload your
code and AWS handles the rest all at no
additional cost getting started with
Amazon web services is easy just go to
the Amazon web services website and
click on the sign up button you'll get
access to all of the AWS cloud services
along with great benefits like a free
years's worth of a machine running in
the cloud a free years worth of database
access free storage bandwidth archiving
caching and much more want to know more
about web apps and what Amazon web
services can do for your applications
just visit our website at aws.amazon.com
websites to learn more and get started
today
